cases.title: Accessing the system
cases.description: Testing

steps.action: Navigate to https://teodor.bg/
steps.expected_result: Home page is loaded and looks like attached picture

suites.title: 01. Main Pages
suites.description: We are testing the main pages on teodor.bg
suites.preconditions:
Access the system with non-registered user
Page width is set to 1080px

cases.title: Open Our shops
cases.description: We can open "Our shops" page.

steps.action: Find a navigator
Click on "Магазини"
Verify that page title to be "Магазини за мъжка мода в цялата страна — TEODOR"
Assert that page looks like in the picture

cases.title: Links by city
cases.description: Test link for shops in "Стара Загора"

steps.action: Locate Store Listed paragraph
Click on "Стара Загора"
Verify Title
steps.expected_result: Title = "Стара Загора • Магазини за мъжки дрехи — TEODOR"

steps.action: Assert that page looks like attached picture
Locate Drop down filter radio button
Click on It
Click on "Плевен" option
Verify that Map is changed
Assert that page looks like attached image

cases.title: Direct click on "ЗА КЛИЕНТИ"
cases.description: Testing what is happening when we are clicking on "ЗА КЛИЕНТИ" menu options.

steps.action: Click on "ЗА КЛИЕНТИ"
Verify page title
steps.expected_result: title="Брандиране на дрехи с лого и изработка на униформи — TEODOR — TEODOR"

steps.action: Assert that page looks like attached image

cases.title: Inspect "Loyalty card clients"
cases.description: Assert loyalty card clients page.

steps.action: Hover a mouse over "ЗА КЛИЕНТИ"
Click on "Карти за лоялни клиенти"
Verify title
steps.expected_result: title="Карти за отстъпки за лоялни клиенти • Мъжки дрехи — TEODOR — TEODOR"

steps.action: Assert that page looks like attached image

cases.title: Inspect "full-concept"
cases.description: Assert full concept client page.

steps.action: Hover a mouse over "ЗА КЛИЕНТИ"
Click on "Цялостна визия"
Verify title
steps.expected_result: title="Специално предложение за сезон Пролет/Лято 2021 — TEODOR"

steps.action: Assert that page looks like attached image

suites.title: 01.03. Contacts
suites.description: We are trying to test every possible problem on contact form

suites.description: We are testing links on contact page

cases.title: First Phone number link
cases.description: Trying to make a call from link

steps.action: Press on Phone number
Assert that Pop up message looks like attached image

cases.title: Email link
cases.description: Trying to send a mail from link

steps.action: Press on Email underline
Assert that you are redirected to mail client

cases.title: Second phone number link
cases.description: Trying to make a call from link

steps.action: Press on Phone number
Assert that Pop up message looks like attached image

cases.title: Our Shops link
cases.description: Test that link for our shops works as expected.

steps.action: Press on "Разгледай"
Assert that page we are redirected to "https://teodor.bg/magazini"
Assert that page title is "Магазини за мъжка мода в цялата страна — TEODOR"

cases.title: Empty Fields
cases.description: Try to send contact form with empty fields

steps.action: Press on "Изпрати" button
Assert that form is not sent
Assert that Empty field messages appear

cases.title: Name field validation
cases.description: Test name field validation with symbols, numbers and more than hundred characters.

steps.action: Fill "Име" field with input
Click outside name box
Assert that error message is "Грешен формат"

cases.title: Email field validation
cases.description: Test email field validation

steps.action: Fill "Email" field with input
Click outside name box
Assert that error message is "Грешен формат"

cases.title: Phone field validation
cases.description: Test phonefield validation

steps.action: Fill "Phone" field with input
Click outside name box
Assert that error message is "Грешен формат"

cases.title: About field validation
cases.description: Test about field validation with symbols, numbers and more than hundred characters.

steps.action: Fill "Относно" field with input
Click outside name box
Assert that error message is "Грешен формат"

cases.title: Vallid contact Form
cases.description: Assure that form works with valid input data

steps.action: Fill field "Име" with input
Fill field "Email" with input
Fill field "Телефон" with input
Fill field "Относно" with input
Fill field "Съобщение" with input
Check the checkbox
Click on "Изпрати"
Assert that form is submitted
Assert that every field is empty

cases.title: Assert Redirection

steps.action: Press "Контакти" button on navigator

suites.title: 02. Registration
suites.description: These tests purpose is to assert registration form.
suites.preconditions:
Access the system with non-registered user
Page width is set to 1080px
Navigate to https://teodor.bg/customer/account/create/

cases.title: Validation only letters characters
cases.description: Test that error message will appear when we submit a form with names from numbers and special symbols.

steps.action: Fill field "Име"
Fill field "Фамилия"
Press "Регистрация" button
Assert that form is not submitted
Assert that error messages are "Полетата за имена трябва да съдържат само букви"

cases.title: Check name fileds max length
cases.description: We are trying to write a name with more that 30 symbols

steps.action: Fill field "Име"
Fill field "Фамилия"
Press "РЕГИСТРАЦИЯ"
Assert that form is not submitted
Assert that error message is "Полето Име не може да съдържа повече от 30 символа"
Fill every field with valid data
Fill Email field
Check every required checkboxes
Press "РЕГИСТРАЦИЯ" button
Assert that error message looks like attached image

cases.title: Email validat
cases.description: Testing email validation

steps.action: Fill every field with valid data
Check every required checkboxes
Fill "Email" field
Press "РЕГИСТРАЦИЯ"

Assert that error massage is displayed with
recommended steps

cases.title: Facebook sign up screeen button
cases.description: Try to login with Facebook

steps.action: Click on the "Facebook" button
steps.expected_result:
User is redirected to the
respective Facebook page

steps.action: Assert that redirected page is correct

cases.title: Google sign up screeen button
cases.description: Try to login with Google

steps.action: Click on the "Google" button
steps.expected_result:
User is redirected to the
respective Google page

steps.action: Assert that redirected page is correct
Verify page title
Assert that page looks like in a picture

cases.title: Create registration with valid data
cases.description: We are testing registration form with valid data.

steps.action: Fill in field "Име"
Fill in field "Фамилия"
Fill in field "Email"
Fill in field "Парола"
Fill in field "Потвърди паролата"
Check checkbox that is required
Check checkbox for "I am not a robot"
Press "РЕГИСТРАЦИЯ" button
Assert that "Успешна регистрация" field is presented on the screen

cases.title: Click "Refresh" after input credentials
cases.description: We are trying to refresh the page and see that it doesn't save our credentials

steps.action: Fill every field with valid input
Check every required checkbox
Refresh the page
Assert that every field is empty
Assert that every checkbox is unchecked

suites.title: 03. Log In
suites.preconditions:
Access the system with non-registered user
Page width is set to 1080px
Navigate to https://teodor.bg/customer/account/login/

cases.title: Successful LogIn
cases.description: Try to log in with valid data

steps.action: Field field "Email"
Field field "Парола"
Press "Вход"
steps.expected_result:
Successful log in
Redirect to https://teodor.bg/customer/account/

steps.action: Verify that page title is "Моят профил — TEODOR"
Assert that page looks like an attached picture

cases.title: Empty Log in Fields
cases.description: Try to log in with empty fields

steps.action: Verify that rmail field is empty
Verify that password field is empty
Click on "Вход" button
Assert that alert messages for required field are shown.
Fill in field "Email"
Fill in field "Password"
Click on "Вход" button
steps.expected_result:
Page is reloaded
Alert Message is presented
Password field is empty

steps.action: Assert that Alert message is like in the picture
Fill in field "Email"
Fill in field "Password"
Click on "Вход" button
steps.expected_result:
Page is reloaded
Alert Message is presented
Password field is empty

steps.action: Assert that Alert message is like in the picture

cases.title: Email Validation
cases.description: Trying to log in with invalid format email.

steps.action: Fill in field "Email"
Press "Вход" button
steps.expected_result: Alert message is shown "Моля, въведете валиден имейл адрес (Ex: johndoe@domain.com)."

suites.title: 04. Search
suites.description:
Access the system with non-registered user
Page width is set to 1080px
Navigate to https://teodor.bg/

cases.title: Search with numbers
cases.description: Trying to test search engine with number

steps.action: Press the magnifier
Write in 1234567890
Press "Enter"
Assert that info message appear
Assert that no results appear

cases.title: Search "Риза" with number
cases.description: Trying to test search engine with "Риза" with numbers

steps.action: Press the magnifier
Write in "Риза 1234567890"
Press "Enter"
Assert that info message appear
Assert that no similar result appears

cases.title: Search with symbols
cases.description: Trying to test search engine with sybols

steps.action: Press the magnifier
Write in "@%DAD Боти"
Press "Enter"
Assert that info message appear
Assert that no results appear

cases.title: Search with space before and after word
cases.description: Trying to find a shirt with space before and after word.

steps.action: Press the magnifier
Write in " Риза "
Press "Enter"
Assert result from searching is 'РИЗА'

cases.title: Search in latin
cases.description: Try to search with latin letters

steps.action: Press the magnifier
Write in "Shirt"
Press "Enter"
Assert that info message appear

suites.title: 07.Cart
suites.preconditions:
Access the system with non-register user
Navigate to https://teodor.bg/product-200147171895-3
Add to cart 1 blue colour, 42 size, 2 brown colour 42,43 size, and 2 beige colour size 44.
Click on cart button

cases.title: Assert page redirection and view
cases.description: Assert that cart view looks like expected

steps.action: Assert that page link is "https://teodor.bg/checkout/cart/"
Assert that page looks like attached image
Assert that page title is "Количка — TEODOR"

cases.title: Reduce the quantity
cases.description: Assure that reducing quantity button works

steps.action: Click "-" button to an item in the cart that have quantity - 2
Assert that an item quantity is set to 1
Assert that total price is reduced whit product price

cases.title: Reduce the quantity to zero
cases.description: Assure that you cant reduce the quantity to zero

steps.action: Click "-" button to an item in the cart that have quantity - 1
Assert that an item quantity is set to 1
Assert that total price is the same

cases.title: Increase the quantity
cases.description: Assure that you can increase the quantity

steps.action: Click "+" button to an item in the cart that have quantity - 1
Assert that an item quantity is set to 2
Assert that total price is increased with product price

cases.title: Delete an item
cases.description: Assert that delete button works as expected

steps.action: Click delete button on first item
Assert that an item that you deleted is not in the cart
Assert that price is correct.

cases.title: Edit item
cases.description: Assure that customer can edit item properties from basket

steps.action: Click on pencil button on first item
Change preselected size property
Click on "Актуализирай количката"
Assert that changes are submitted

cases.title: Promo code field
cases.description: Assert that promo code field will appear

steps.action: Click on "Ако имате промо код или код за ваучер, въведето го тук"
Assert that promo code section looks as attached picture
Click on "Ако имате промо код или код за ваучер, въведето го тук"
Click on "Приложи"
Assert that page is not reloaded
Assert that error message is "Това е задължително поле."

cases.title: Finish your order
cases.description: Assure that finish your order button work as expected

steps.action: Click on "Към завършване"
Assert that page title is "Поръчай — TEODOR"

cases.title: Finish your order with empty cart
cases.description: Assure that you can complete your order with empty cart

steps.action: Delete every item in cart
Assert that cart looks like attached picture
